mapper.select: SELECT CHENGGMC PINZMC ZHUANLMC RJMC BIAOZMC FROM KY_CG_JBXX KY_CG_YCPZ KY_CG_PZQPZ KY_CG_ZL KY_CG_RJZZQXX KY_CG_ZDBZXX WHERE TIJZT = 'Y' AND CGBM = #{zaasCode}
SELECT TOP 1 project_num FROM CY_CGZHJY WHERE project_num LIKE #{mark} + '%' ORDER BY project_num DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CY_CGZHJY SET submit_state = #{submitState}, submiter_id = #{userId}, submiter = #{name}, operator_id = #{userId}, operator = #{name}, modify_date = #{date} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CY_CGZHJY WHERE project_num = #{projectNum} AND submit_state = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CY_CGZHJY WHERE project_type_code like #{typeCode}+'%'
